      • getPlateCharacter

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Character> getPlateCharacter(java.awt.image.BufferedImage img)

      • SketchContours

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Mat> SketchContours(Mat src)
                                               throws java.io.IOException

        takes a plate clip image and finds contours from it. Returns contours that are verified as plausible characters with pre-defined character sizes.

        The major risk in this function is that the image threshold value affects the success rate of getting the right contours.

        Parameters:
        src - The input image
        Returns:
        An arrayList of contours that are plausible characters.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - returns an exception when image is not able to be displayed with the displayImage function.

      • GetCharacter

        public static char GetCharacter(Mat contour)

        takes in a detected contour, which is a character, and returns the result as a character type.

        The function will only work if the MLP is trained with the given training files.

        Parameters:
        contour - Takes in a contour Mat, which should be given a set of contours by SketchContours function

      • segmentation

        public static java.util.List<MatOfPoint> segmentation(Mat img)

      • getTrainingFiles

        public static void getTrainingFiles(java.lang.String filepath)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Get training data files from the folder and load it onto a Mat
        Parameters:
        filepath - The given path to the folder with all training characters
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • clearTrainingFiles

        public static boolean clearTrainingFiles()
        cleans the static training variables and training labels. This should be done before fetching a new one.
        Returns:
        status of the training files. Return trues if all static variables are null
